title: Leading Croatian national team players at FIFA World Cup 2018 , by market value
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 23 number of Months.
Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros and Dominik Livakovic has the lowest Market value in million euros.
The highest Month Ivan Rakitic has 48.5 more Market value in million euros than the lowest Month Dominik Livakovic.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The maximum Market value in million euros 50.0 is found at Month Ivan Rakitic and the minimum is found at Dominik Livakovic where Month is 1.5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 23 number of Months.
Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros and Dominik Livakovic has the lowest Market value in million euros.
The highest Month Ivan Rakitic has 48.5 more Market value in million euros than the lowest Month Dominik Livakovic.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 23 number of Months.
The Market value in million euros is highest at Month Ivan Rakitic and lowest at Month Dominik Livakovic.
Month Ivan Perisic has the second highest value for Market value in million euros.
The Market value in million euros of Month Ivan Rakitic is 33.33% larger than the minimum value at Dominik Livakovic.
Market value in million euros at Month Ivan Rakitic is 50.0 , second place is Ivan Perisic at 40.0, and thirdly is Mateo Kovacic at 30.0.
Over the past 23 Months, the Market value in million euros has declined.
Month Andrej Kramaric, and Marcelo Brozovic share the same value 27.0.
Considered together, the average Market value in million euros in all 23 Months is roughly 15.83.
